definition: (of a sound) to come through/to be heard/(of news) to arrive
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Aloft in the air, as if from the depths of the cloud, came a confused and doubtful sound of voices.
sentences.chinese: 高空中，彷彿自雲團深處，傳來一片可疑的嘈雜人聲。

sentences.english: Natasha's voice rang out in the frost -bound air.
sentences.chinese: 在冰凍天氣的冷空氣中傳來娜塔莎的說話聲。

sentences.english: He sent it for my review and I had revised it slightly. The resulting file is attached.
sentences.chinese: 他傳來給我校閱而我已略作修訂，完稿檔案附呈。

sentences.english: Reports of deaths across the country trickle in almost every day.
sentences.chinese: 全國各地的死亡報告幾乎每天都陸陸續續傳來。

sentences.english: Firecrackers boomed out from the front of a shop echoing loudly.
sentences.chinese: 前面的小店裏傳來的隆隆的爆竹聲。

sentences.english: On such a hot summer, another good news arrived at Somso.
sentences.chinese: 熱情似火的夏天，西堡酒莊又傳來喜訊。

sentences.english: Suddenly, the distant and melancholy vibration of a clock shook the panes.
sentences.chinese: 令人悵惘的鐘聲忽然從遠處傳來，震撼着窗上的玻璃。

sentences.english: In the distance sounded a solemn, stirring reed flute.
The government has countered such negative reports with positive propaganda.
sentences.chinese: 政府則用正面宣傳來反駁這樣的負面報道。

sentences.english: Then he heard a clanking noise deep down below .
sentences.chinese: 接着他聽見地下深處傳來一陣叮噹聲。

sentences.english: At a time when mountain too proud, uncle Mao Qingyuan the late news.
sentences.chinese: 就在高山春風得意之時，大伯毛清源過世的消息傳來。

sentences.english: Weeping, Cinderella left the room with her stepsisters' wicked laughter behind her.
sentences.chinese: 灰姑娘哭着離開房間，背後傳來她繼姐妹邪惡的笑聲。

sentences.english: Occasionally heard "creak" A snow pressure to cut off the branches.
sentences.chinese: 偶爾會傳來“咯吱”一聲，積雪把樹枝壓斷了。

sentences.english: Qui-Gon heard the sound of boots thudding in the hallway.
sentences.chinese: 這時，魁剛忽然聽到走廊裏傳來嘈雜的皮靴聲。

sentences.english: Through the grass came a soft silvery tinkling.
sentences.chinese: 從草海中傳來了一陣微弱的銀叮鈴聲。

sentences.english: When he is felicitous, he hears there's enormous roaring from the deep cliff.
sentences.chinese: 正在慶幸的時候，他聽到斷崖深處傳來巨大的吼聲。
